page.title: 02Detailed Survey OS 05480210
page.content:
The area surveyed is a 1km square (SW ref 05490211)
The area is mostly{arable farmland} with about 5%{deciduous woodland.}The major crops grown, in percentage of the total area, are:- {Wheat} about 56% {Rape} about 16% {Barley} about 8% {Grazing} about 5% The area occupied by{buildings and {gardens}is about 2%.{Roads and verges} occupy about 8%.
There are twelve houses, one of which is derelict and two groups of farm buildings, one derelict. The only facility is a post box.
The{M11}crosses the area from north to south. There is no access to it.
